100.name: 幸运
100.desc:
<FONT color="#D4FF88">5%</FONT> 几率重置技能冷却.
不适用于空格, 起身 and 觉醒 技能.
Effect triggers only on first skill use. If skill is used a获得 after reset, effect will not trigger.

101.name: 会心
101.desc:
(取代前者效果)
暴击伤害 <FONT color="#D4FF88">+12%</FONT>.

102.name: 大师
102.desc:
使用技能后，暴击记录 <FONT color="#D4FF88">+1.4%</FONT> for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">10</FONT> 秒.
叠加 <FONT color="#FFFFAC">5</FONT> 次.
受到伤害层数降低.

102.name: 大师
102.desc: 额外伤害 <FONT color="#D4FF88">+1.7%</FONT> 每层.

103.name: Strong Union
103.desc:
When HP is above <FONT color="#FFFFAC">50%</FONT>, 伤害 <FONT color="#D4FF88">+4%</FONT> and 伤害 Taken <FONT color="#D4FF88">-4%</FONT>.
When HP is below <FONT color="#FFFFAC">50%</FONT>, 伤害 <FONT color="#D4FF88">+3%</FONT> and 伤害 Taken <FONT color="#D4FF88">-6%</FONT>.

104.name: 刀锋盾牌
104.desc:
On hit, creates a shield that absorbs 伤害 up to <FONT color="#D4FF88">6%</FONT> of 最大生命值 for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">15s</FONT>. (冷却 <FONT color="#FFFFAC">12s</FONT>.)
While shield is active, 伤害 <FONT color="#D4FF88">+4%</FONT>.

104.name: 刀锋盾牌
104.desc: While shield is active, 伤害 <FONT color="#D4FF88">+8%</FONT> instead.

105.name: Vanguard
105.desc:
After using a 空格, 获得 Charge for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">20s</FONT>. On hit, 获得 Courage for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">6s</FONT>.
Charge: 伤害 <FONT color="#D4FF88">+3%</FONT>.
Courage: 攻击力 <FONT color="#D4FF88">+3%</FONT>.

105.name: Vanguard
105.desc: When both Charge and Courage are active, 伤害 <FONT color="#D4FF88">+5%</FONT>.

106.name: Luminary
106.desc:
On skill use, 攻击增益效果 <FONT color="#D4FF88">+1.6%</FONT> for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">8s</FONT>.
Stacks <FONT color="#FFFFAC">5</FONT> times.

106.name: Luminary
106.desc: Upon reaching max stacks, 攻击增益效果 <FONT color="#D4FF88">+6%</FONT> and 冷却 <FONT color="#D4FF88">-5%</FONT>.

107.name: 进军
107.desc:
When applying a protection effect, create an Ether. (冷却: <FONT color="#FFFFAC">10s</FONT>)
Ether provides 武器攻击力 <FONT color="#D4FF88">+2230</FONT> to nearby allies. (Duration: <FONT color="#FFFFAC">15s</FONT>)

107.name: 进军
107.desc: When Ether is created, Movement Speed <FONT color="#D4FF88">+8%</FONT> for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">15s</FONT>. ATK Power effectiveness <FONT color="#D4FF88">+6%</FONT>.

108.name: 信念
108.desc:
使用觉醒时, 获得信念效果 <FONT color="#FFFFAC">3m</FONT>.
信念: 攻击力增益 <FONT color="#D4FF88">+8%</FONT>.

108.name: 信念
108.desc: 信念: 攻击力增益 <FONT color="#D4FF88">+14%</FONT> and 职业能量 <FONT color="#D4FF88">+5%</FONT>.
